=C2=A0 



Yeah, the H2, H4, Olympu=
s LS-10, etc. are really meant for recording of events such as live music w=
here you need decent quality stereo recordings. We here are probably not so=
 interested in stereo recordings.

I see the LS-10 is available at Amazon n=
ow for $199. This is quite cheaper than when it first came out. Little Stev=
en recommends that unit.

Zack

=C2=A0 

Playback through the machine it=
self is pretty good. I do not own one but I borrow one from a friend fairly=
 often to record bands. Then I take it home and transfer the files to my co=
mputer to use there. But I do listen to see how it sounds during breaks.

Z=
ack
